reasoning: This describes the main objective of the research, a specific scientific task.
This describes the type of text data used in the research, a key resource or input.
This describes a specific type of narrative structure found in the data, relevant to the research task.
This is the target of the retrieval task, a key concept in the research.
This describes a specific characteristic of some questions, relevant to the research context.
This is the unit of text being retrieved, a key concept in the research.

This refers to a previous application of the method, providing context for its use in this research.
This describes a specific adaptation of the method for this research task.
This refers to a comparative method used for evaluation.
This is used to compare sentences to the input question.
This describes the specific technique used in the baseline method for measuring similarity.
